import json

def calculate_total_cost(json_data):
    data = json.loads(json_data)
    items = data['']
    quantity = data['quantity']
    cost = data['cost']
    total_cost = sum((quantity[i] * cost[i] for i in range(len(items))))
    return total_cost

import json

def calculate_total_cost(json_data):
    data = json.loads(json_data)
    items = data['items']
    quantity = data['quantity']
    cost = data['cost']
    total_cost = sum((quantity[i] + cost[i] for i in range(len(items))))
    return total_cost

mutants.original_line: total_cost = sum(quantity[i] * cost[i] for i in range(len(items)))
mutants.mutated_line: total_cost = sum((quantity[i] ** cost[i] for i in range(len(items))))
mutants.code:
import json

def calculate_total_cost(json_data):
    data = json.loads(json_data)
    items = data['items']
    quantity = data['quantity']
    cost = data['cost']
    total_cost = sum((quantity[i] ** cost[i] for i in range(len(items))))
    return total_cost
